content: अनुवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (sometimes <ab>P.</ab> also) {@--1@} (Transitively used) ({%a%}) To go or roll after, follow, pursue; (<ab>fig.</ab>) to follow, conform to, act according to, obey, adapt oneself to, be guided by; humour; अहं तावत्स्वामिनश्चित्तवृत्तिमनुवर्तिष्ये <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; तेऽपि परिचयमनुवर्तंते <ls>K. 289</ls>; किमत्र चित्रं यदि विशाखे शशांकलेखामनुवर्तेते <ls>Ś. 3</ls> approve of her choice; लौकिकानां हि साधूनामर्थं वागनुवर्तते <ls>U. 1. 10</ls> words conform to the sense; न कुलक्रममनुवर्तते <ls>K. 104</ls> follow; मधु द्विरेफः कुसुमैकपात्रे पपौ प्रियां स्वामनुवर्तमानः <ls>Ku. 3. 36</ls> followed his mate in drinking, drank after her; <ls>Bh. 2. 110</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 23</ls>; <ls>Dk. 80</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">96</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">126</ls>; कृतज्ञतामनुवर्तमानेन <ls>Mu. 3</ls> following the path of gratitude; प्रभुचित्तमेव हि जनोऽनुवर्तते <ls>Śi. 15. 41</ls>; <ls>Māl. 3. 2.</ls> ({%b%}) To imitate, resemble; equal; तेऽन्ववर्तन् पितॄन्सर्वे यशसा च बलेन च <ls>Mb.</ls> ({%c%}) To gratify, humour, please; <ls>Dk. 65.</ls> {@--2@} (Intransitively used) ({%a%}) To follow, come after; संग्राह्य इत्यनुवर्तते <ls>H. 3.</ls> ({%b%}) To continue, endure. ({%c%}) To act towards, behave. ({%d%}) (In <ab>gram.</ab>) To be repeated or supplied from a preceding rule, Sūtra or assertion (said of a word or rule which continues to exercise influence on what follows); {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in <ls>P. IV. 3. 95</ls> भक्तिः सोऽस्य (occurring in Sūtra 89 before) इत्यनुवर्तते <ls>Sk.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to revolve, turn round; एवं प्रवर्तितं चक्रं नानुवर्तयतीह यः <ls>Bg. 3. 16.</ls> {@--2@} To act up to, follow, obey; तथापि लोकयात्रानुवर्तनीया <ls>Mv. 7</ls>; पुत्रैः पितरो लोकद्वयेप्यनुवर्तनीयाः <ls>Ve. 3</ls>; <ls>K. 367.</ls> {@--3@} To favour, oblige; comply with one's request; विधिनापि भवतेव वयमनुवर्तिताः <ls>K. 73</ls>; यथाचित्तमनुवर्तनीयः <ls>Māl. 7.</ls> {@--4@} To put in, carry out. {@--5@} To repeat or supply from a preceding Sūtra; केचित्तु विजायते इति नानुवर्तयंति <ls>P. V. 2. 13</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--6@} To use, employ. {@--7@} To lead one to, attach to. {@--8@} To speak in favour of, speak for; to approve. {@--9@} To imitate, do after one; सतां चरितान्यनुवर्तितानि नद्रियाणि <ls>K. 298.</ls>
